explains: v. 佔用，占领（occupy 的 ing 形式）

sentences.en: The occupying forces set up a puppet government.
sentences.cn: 占领军建立了一个傀儡政府。

sentences.en: Continuous bombing spearheaded the way to occupying the city.
sentences.cn: 持续不断的轰炸为占领这座城市开辟了道路。

sentences.en: But just some 22,000 birds remain today, occupying about 16% of the species' historic range.
sentences.cn: 但如今仅存的鸟类只有约22000只，约占该物种有史以来数量的16%。
